content:
KUALA LUMPUR (June 26): LB Aluminium Bhd’s (KL:LBALUM) net profit climbed 62.67% to RM9.43 million for its fourth quarter ended April 30, 2024 (4QFY2024), from RM5.8 million a year before, on higher contributions from both the aluminium and property segments.

summary: The Malaysian Maritime Enforcement Agency (MMEA) seized 46 barrels of subsidised petrol, amounting to 1,150 litres, left on a boat in the waters of Pulai Berhala near here. It is believed the fuel was in the process of being smuggled to the Philippines on Tuesday.
content:
SANDAKAN (June 26): The Malaysian Maritime Enforcement Agency (MMEA) seized 46 barrels of subsidised petrol, amounting to 1,150 litres, left on a boat in the waters of Pulai Berhala near here. It is believed the fuel was in the process of being smuggled to the Philippines on Tuesday.

content:
KUALA LUMPUR (June 25): MClean Technologies Bhd (KL:MCLEAN) on Tuesday announced the sale of a 28.53% stake in the company to Singapore-listed Accrelist Ltd.

MClean, in its brief filing to Bursa Malaysia, did not state the sale price.

But Accrelist, in its announcement to the Singapore Exchange (SGX), said it is buying the stake, comprising 56.27 million shares, from six shareholders of MClean for just over RM9 million or 16 sen per share.
